name: Bath Tub Duck
description:
A duck swimming program puzzle:

Instructions:

  • You're the yellow duck
  • Peck the big bubbles to get "a new beginning" / "checkpoint"
  • Green ducks peck back
  • Boats are sturdy... use 2 pecks
  • The sub1 program is run every time "sub1" is listed in the main program.
  • Peck 4 bubbles to win!
  • (but the game doesn't have an ending)
